metadata.name: Letter ( z ) Number ( 28 )
metadata.description:
Esperanto is the most common international auxiliary language based on the idea of eliminating misunderstandings between people of different nationalities.

This project is an author's vision regarding the Esperanto language and its core idea.

28 unique NFTs refer to 28 letters of the Esperanto alphabet and its main idea.

Unique sound design for the project was created by a famous musical artist - Biicla.

In addition to the token itself, an NFT holder will be sent an exclusive merch T-shirt and an authentication certificate confirming the authenticity of the NFT.

Everyone can choose a letter or a number based on their own considerations or wishes, thereby becoming a part of the project.

All money earned above the starting price will be given to charity.

This project has a unique concept.

Before placing your bid, be sure to read about our project, its main idea and all the details on the [website](http://tvorch-esperanto-nft.com/)
